0b01855b-3f3c-41c3-ba87-66b31d2d3eeb:
Benefit: Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, you can disarm your opponent, in addition to the normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. If your confirmation {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, you may disarm your opponent as if from the disarm {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. This does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
Normal: You must perform a disarm combat maneuver to disarm an opponent.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one of the following {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} to a given critical hit: Bull Rush Strike, Disarming Strike, Repositioning Strike, Sundering Strike, or Tripping Strike. You may choose to use this feat after you make your confirmation roll.
d8ca5ba2-7c38-49ad-afc7-26899432c9aa:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} gives the character an ability to perform the bull rush {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. It also grants a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} when performing this maneuver, and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against it.
A bull rush attempts to push an opponent straight back without doing any harm. If your combat maneuver is successful, your target is pushed back 5 feet. For every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds your opponent's CMD you can push the target back an additional 5 feet.
An enemy being moved by a bull rush does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} because of the movement unless you possess the Greater Bull Rush feat. You cannot bull rush a creature into a square that is occupied by a solid object or obstacle.
f74caddc-78f8-468e-8af6-371f8ab3b377:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} gives the character an ability to perform the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. It also grants a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} when performing this maneuver, and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against it.
You can attempt to hinder a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is successful, the target takes a penalty. The penalty is limited to one of the following conditions: {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g}, {g|ConditionEntangled}entangled{/g}, or {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g}.
This condition lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. For every 5 by which your attack exceeds your opponent's CMD, the penalty lasts 1 additional round.
13d9f747-9c43-49e1-a50d-fed7695e8581:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} gives the character an ability to perform the disarm {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. It also grants a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} when performing this maneuver, and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against it.
You can attempt to disarm a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your combat maneuver is successful, the target cannot use his weapons for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
For every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds your opponent's CMD, the disarmed condition lasts 1 additional round.
f5cda27a-2587-4978-bdba-74bb2beabe89:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} gives the character an ability to perform the sunder armor {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. It also grants a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} when performing this maneuver, and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against it.
You can attempt to dislodge an armor worn by your opponent. If your combat maneuver is successful, the target loses its bonuses from armor for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
For every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds your opponent's CMD, the penalty lasts 1 additional round.
294cdc6a-8d05-4977-b7ff-a1ac1d9a56be:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} gives the character an ability to perform the trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. It also grants a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} when performing this maneuver, and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when defending against it.
You can attempt to trip your opponent in place of a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}. If your combat maneuver is successful, the target is knocked {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}.
If the target has more than two legs, add +2 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the combat maneuver {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} for each additional leg it has. Some creatures — such as oozes, creatures without legs, and flying creatures — cannot be tripped.
981b15a4-a022-4525-a1bb-a2d2a3e42ce4:
You can attempt to disarm a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} is successful, the target cannot use his weapons for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
For every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, the disarmed condition lasts 1 additional round.
93591497-f353-4f87-b80b-01d6efcf8b99:
You can attempt to dislodge a piece of armor worn by your opponent. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} is successful, the target loses its {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from armor for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
For every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, the penalty lasts 1 additional round.
0986ab45-3f84-4540-8b5e-ad6e6ab04942:
You can attempt to hinder a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is successful, the target is {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g}.
This condition lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. For every 5 by which your attack exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, the penalty lasts 1 additional round.
66cdeddf-e956-4d8c-9eba-d1b7c4616148:
You can attempt to hinder a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is successful, the target is {g|ConditionEntangled}entangled{/g}.
This condition lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. For every 5 by which your attack exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, the penalty lasts 1 additional round.
763ccc85-1cf0-4a83-a9c5-00d8cc85fced:
You can attempt to hinder a foe in melee as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is successful, the target is {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g}.
This condition lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. For every 5 by which your attack exceeds your opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}, the penalty lasts 1 additional round.
882f2dbb-e005-4b83-bbe0-83aa3230e932:
You can attempt to trip your opponent in place of a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}. If your {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} is successful, the target is knocked {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g}.
If the target has more than two legs, add +2 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the combat maneuver {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} for each additional leg it has. Some creatures — such as oozes, creatures without legs, and flying creatures — cannot be tripped.
84409444-9540-4308-8035-dbf7015f546c:
You can make free {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} on foes that you knock down.
Benefit: You receive a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to trip a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Trip. Whenever you successfully trip an opponent, that opponent provokes {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
Normal: Creatures do not provoke attacks of opportunity from being tripped.
b8b84289-e0da-447c-9615-0cb5df047a3f:
You can use strength and agility to send foes crashing to the ground.
Benefit: When making a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, add your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g}.
453522e0-4d34-4c33-aa4f-1095ff68c338: You receive a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to attempt a dirty trick. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Dirty Trick. Whenever you successfully perform a dirty trick, the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} lasts for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, plus 1 round for every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds the target's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
aa654647-0d24-4fe8-bf85-6b33a19bfc79: You receive a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to attempt a disarm. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Disarm. Whenever you successfully perform a disarm, the penalty lasts for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, plus 1 round for every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds the target's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
3e939a00-2a04-4de5-aaef-dd50d042ce15: You receive a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to attempt a sunder. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Sunder Armor. Whenever you successfully perform a sunder, the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} lasts for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, plus 1 round for every 5 by which your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} exceeds the target's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
f0d27ea3-1dc1-4896-9f71-04ce5b3dbb4c: You receive a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to bull rush a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Bull Rush. Whenever you bull rush an opponent, his movement provokes {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} from you and all of your allies.
27d8c5ad-d045-4c6b-a537-e52551e5388f: You receive a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to overrun a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g} whenever an opponent tries to overrun you.
7cf5a567-6c01-4236-aaf6-cc68fa46eb99: You receive a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g} whenever an opponent tries to trip you.
7de749e1-e48f-4125-9ec7-7ca73713fa9f: You receive a +8 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g} whenever an opponent tries to trip you.
